localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

Soar through the skies in a balloon powered by Maths!

Soar through the skies in a balloon powered by knowledge! Choose from addition, subtraction, multiplication, division or all four and see how long you can keep your balloon afloat. Collect coins, avoid obstacles and conquer the skies all with the awesome power of maths!

Aimed at ages 4+ this game has simple and easy to grasp controls. A happy soundtrack and awesome graphics make this game perfect for kids, Offering a learning space that is engaging, challenging and fun.

Package size: 51 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Cooply Solutions LTD

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
